Package com.service

Class InsuranceService

java.lang.Object
com.service.InsuranceService
public class InsuranceService extends Object
InsuranceService - Provides business logic for managing insurance policies.

  • Constructor Details

    • InsuranceService

      public InsuranceService()

  • Method Details

    • validateUnderWriterLogin

      public int validateUnderWriterLogin(String userName, String password)
      Validates the login credentials of an underwriter.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the underwriter.
      password - the password of the underwriter.
      Returns:
      the ID of the underwriter if credentials are valid, otherwise -1.

    • createPolicy

      public int createPolicy(String vehicleNo, String vehicleType, String customerName, int engineNo, int chasisNo, String phoneNo, String insuranceType, LocalDate fromDate, int underwriterId)
      Creates a new insurance policy with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      vehicleNo - the vehicle number.
      vehicleType - the type of the vehicle.
      customerName - the name of the customer.
      engineNo - the engine number of the vehicle.
      chasisNo - the chassis number of the vehicle.
      phoneNo - the phone number of the customer.
      insuranceType - the type of insurance.
      fromDate - the start date of the insurance.
      underwriterId - the ID of the underwriter creating the policy.
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly created policy.

    • renewPolicy

      public Policy renewPolicy(int policyNo, int underwriterId)
      Renews an existing or expired insurance policy.
      Parameters:
      policyNo - the number of the policy to be renewed.
      underwriterId - the ID of the underwriter renewing the policy.
      Returns:
      the renewed Policy object if the renewal was successful, null otherwise.

    • updatePolicy

      public Policy updatePolicy(int policyNo, int underwriterId)
      Updates an existing insurance policy from Third Party to Full Insurance.
      Parameters:
      policyNo - the number of the policy to be updated.
      underwriterId - the ID of the underwriter performing the update.
      Returns:
      the updated Policy object if the update was successful, null otherwise.

    • viewPolicy

      public Policy viewPolicy(int policyNo)
      Retrieves the details of an existing policy by its policy number.
      Parameters:
      policyNo - the number of the policy to be viewed.
      Returns:
      the Policy object if found, null otherwise.
